daycare_description: we gie ou the abc's of the alphabets - that what kids like - if you want the xyz, you shouldn't be here
we do tots - and we do them well!  just like tater-tots, they'll be as crispy as you left them!

your kids will have fun here - guaranteed!  we will play games - we know they'll love it - after all, we're all kids too... no, really, we are all 8 yr old kids running this camp.  we are not certified!  but the kids will have lots of fun - and 'may' live to tell about it!  either way, you'll save money, too!
when you need that ka ka kare, we put the y in yNot!
